description:
From our law office in Libertyville, Illinois, the attorneys at Dudley & Lake provide invaluable counsel and support to clients across our region who suffered a serious injury or lost a loved one as the result of someone else's negligence or wrongdoing. Since 2001, our law firm has served clients throughout Northern and Central Illinois, and we have become one of our region's leading legal practices for those dealing with complex challenges involving any of the following:

  • Personal injury and wrongful death
  • Medical malpractice
  • Workers' compensation
  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Trucking accidents
  • Nursing home abuse
  • Construction accidents
  • Sexual abuse, assault and filming

Over the course of our history, we have achieved remarkable success advocating on behalf of individuals and families suffering needlessly through no fault of their own. We have also secured millions of dollars in compensation for our plaintiff clients, including a landmark verdict of more than $25 million in a medical malpractice case.

As a result of our success, our law firm has grown to include an additional office in Chicago, and our lawyers have earned consistent top rankings and endorsements from our peers for our outstanding professionalism and service. We have also received numerous testimonials from our satisfied clients, and we find great reward in being able to help so many in our communities during their most dire times of need.

To schedule a free evaluation of your claim, you can contact Dudley & Lake to set up an appointment. Our law firm also currently offers virtual consultations to help keep you and your loved ones safe and healthy in these uncertain times.
